Interrupts.Name: Understreet Loyalty
Interrupts.Trigger: The Skimmer is targeted by an attack or ability from a foe.
Interrupts.Effects: The Skimmer changes the target to one of its adjacent allies. If it has no adjacent allies, it can't take this interrupt.

Actions.Name: Beat Down
Actions.Effects: On hit, each other ally of the Skimmer adjacent to the target foe deals [fray] damage to them.

Actions.Name: That One!
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they count as holding a valuables token and are branded+.

Actions.Name: Overtime
Actions.Description: The Skimmer marks an ally in range 6.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the ally gains regeneration and is sturdy.

Actions.Name: Gang Up
Actions.Description: Up to three allies of the Skimmer in range 5 can dash 3 spaces. If they end their turn adjacent to the same character, each of them deals [fray] damage to that character.
